## [Drawing](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing)

### Methods

|                                                                                      Method                                                                                       |                                           Return type                                           |                          Brief description                           |
|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [getContainerInfo()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#getContainerInfo())                                                                  | [ContainerInfo](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/container-info) | Gets information about where the drawing is positioned in the sheet. |
| [getHeight()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#getHeight())                                                                                | `Integer`                                                                                       | Returns the actual height of this drawing in pixels.                 |
| [getOnAction()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#getOnAction())                                                                            | `String`                                                                                        | Returns the name of the macro attached to this drawing.              |
| [getSheet()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#getSheet())                                                                                  | [Sheet](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/sheet)                  | Returns the sheet this drawing appears on.                           |
| [getWidth()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#getWidth())                                                                                  | `Integer`                                                                                       | Returns the actual width of this drawing in pixels.                  |
| [getZIndex()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#getZIndex())                                                                                | `Number`                                                                                        | Returns the z-index of this drawing.                                 |
| [remove()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#remove())                                                                                      | `void`                                                                                          | Deletes this drawing from the spreadsheet.                           |
| [setHeight(height)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#setHeight(Integer))                                                                   | [Drawing](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing)              | Sets the actual height of this drawing in pixels.                    |
| [setOnAction(macroName)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#setOnAction(String))                                                             | [Drawing](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing)              | Assigns a macro function to this drawing.                            |
| [setPosition(anchorRowPos, anchorColPos, offsetX, offsetY)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#setPosition(Integer,Integer,Integer,Integer)) | [Drawing](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing)              | Sets the position where the drawing appears on the sheet.            |
| [setWidth(width)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#setWidth(Integer))                                                                      | [Drawing](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing)              | Sets the actual width of this drawing in pixels.                     |
| [setZIndex(zIndex)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing#setZIndex(Number))                                                                    | [Drawing](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/spreadsheet/drawing)              | Sets the z-index of this drawing.                                    |
